external_games.name: I'd Kill You as a Worm

name: I'd Kill You as a Worm
storyline: the game follows someone who has recently been turned into a worm and broken up with. The player needs to navigate through their garden in order to make it to their boyfriend and "take them out," but not on a date...
summary: You turned into a worm and your boyfriend broke up with you. it's time to get revenge
